action-view.name: stock.dashboard.portal.upcoming.deliveries
action-view.title: Upcoming deliveries
action-view.domain: self.toLocation.typeSelect = 2 AND (self.estimatedDate >= CURRENT_DATE AND self.estimatedDate <= :_newDate) AND self.statusSelect = 2

action-view.name: stock.dashboard.portal.late.deliveries
action-view.title: Late deliveries
action-view.domain: self.toLocation.typeSelect = 2 AND self.estimatedDate < CURRENT_DATE AND self.statusSelect = 2

action-view.name: stock.dashboard.portal.upcoming.arrivals
action-view.title: Upcoming arrivals
action-view.domain: self.fromLocation.typeSelect = 2 AND (self.estimatedDate >= CURRENT_DATE AND self.estimatedDate <= :_newDate) AND self.statusSelect = 2

action-view.name: stock.dashboard.portal.late.arrivals
action-view.title: Late arrivals
action-view.domain: self.fromLocation.typeSelect = 2 AND self.estimatedDate < CURRENT_DATE AND self.statusSelect = 2
